description: The FileObject resource allows the creation and management of Avi FileObject

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Checksum.description: Sha1 checksum of the file. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

Compressed.description: This field indicates whether the file is gzip-compressed. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

Created.description: Timestamp of creation for the file. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

Description.description: Description of the file. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

ExpiresAt.description: Timestamp when the file will be no longer needed and can be removed by the system. If this is set, a garbage collector process will try to remove the file after this time. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

IsFederated.description: This field describes the object's replication scope. If the field is set to false, then the object is visible within the controller-cluster and its associated service-engines. If the field is set to true, then the object is replicated across the federation. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

Name.description: Name of the file object. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

Path.description: Path to the file. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

ReadOnly.description: Enforce read-only on the file. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

RestrictDownload.description: Flag to allow/restrict download of the file. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

Size.description: Size of the file. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

TenantRef.description: Tenant that this object belongs to. It is a reference to an object of type tenant. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

Type.description: Type of the file. Enum options - OTHER_FILE_TYPES, IP_REPUTATION, GEO_DB, TECH_SUPPORT, HSMPACKAGES, IPAMDNSSCRIPTS, CONTROLLER_IMAGE. Field introduced in 20.1.1. Allowed in basic(allowed values- other_file_types) edition, essentials(allowed values- other_file_types) edition, enterprise edition.

Version.description: Version of the file. Field introduced in 20.1.1.
